name: River Park Skatepark
description: Neighborhood park along the Bronx River with a compact but fun skate area.
history: Part of South Bronx greenway improvements. Provides much-needed skate infrastructure.
transitDirections: 6 to Brook Ave or 2/5 to 3rd Ave-149th St.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include ledges, rails, quarter pipes, flat bars. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Bronx skate scene in Mott Haven. Part of South Bronx greenway improvements. Provides much-needed skate infrastructure.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: 6 to Brook Ave or 2/5 to 3rd Ave-149th St.. Afternoons. Quiet on weekdays.
